name: PATTERN (itch) (Ismaïne)
description:
Welcome!

Pattern is a "double" sliding puzzle game in which you have to swap pieces on one side or the other to reproduce a pattern.

I'll might update it sometimes for more levels and fixes, do not hesitate to give some feedbacks!

Enjoy the game! <3

Created by Ismaine SAID ALI

Sound Design by Peter WOJETK
https://www.peterwojtek.com/
https://peterwojtek.bandcamp.com/
